North Side's Delegation to Inter-Korean Ministerial Talks Back Home 
   Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- The north side's delegation led by Kwon Ho Ung, chief councilor of the DPRK Cabinet, returned to Pyongyang today after attending the 21st Inter-Korean Ministerial Talks held in Seoul.
